data.name: Dandelion
data.detailed_description:
Join our discord


About the Game



D̶a̶n̶d̶e̶l̶i̶o̶n̶ ̶i̶s̶ ̶a̶ ̶p̶s̶y̶c̶h̶o̶l̶o̶g̶i̶c̶a̶l̶ ̶h̶o̶r̶r̶o̶r̶ ̶a̶d̶v̶e̶n̶t̶u̶r̶e̶ ̶g̶a̶m̶e̶.̶ ̶E̶x̶p̶l̶o̶r̶e̶ ̶a̶ ̶c̶u̶t̶e̶ ̶t̶o̶w̶n̶ ̶f̶u̶l̶l̶ ̶o̶f̶ ̶c̶h̶a̶r̶a̶c̶t̶e̶r̶s̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶m̶e̶e̶t̶,̶ ̶t̶e̶a̶m̶ ̶u̶p̶ ̶w̶i̶t̶h̶ ̶f̶r̶i̶e̶n̶d̶s̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶w̶i̶n̶ ̶a̶n̶ ̶u̶p̶c̶o̶m̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶p̶l̶a̶n̶t̶ ̶e̶x̶h̶i̶b̶i̶t̶i̶o̶n̶.̶ ̶A̶n̶d̶.̶.̶.̶ ̶d̶o̶n̶'̶t̶ ̶b̶e̶ ̶a̶f̶r̶a̶i̶d̶,̶ ̶m̶e̶e̶t̶ ̶i̶t̶ ̶e̶v̶e̶n̶ ̶i̶f̶ ̶y̶o̶u̶ ̶a̶r̶e̶ ̶n̶o̶t̶ ̶r̶e̶a̶d̶y̶

S̶o̶m̶e̶t̶h̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶i̶s̶ ̶t̶r̶y̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶g̶e̶t̶ ̶o̶u̶t̶,̶ ̶i̶t̶'̶s̶ ̶n̶e̶v̶e̶r̶ ̶b̶e̶e̶n̶ ̶c̶l̶o̶s̶e̶r̶

Hey, can you please add me to your demo? I know that I will appear later in the game but
I want to be there, because who knows for how long you will be developing that shit!

Don't even try to refuse

Sincerly,
Vermin

Features


  • Solve puzzles by combining items and share them with others in exchange for precious plant seeds
  • Experiment with plant seeds, prepare for a plant exhibition
  • At least 1 unreasonably thicc pigeon
  • Soulful, character-rich story
  • Original art and soundtrack, carefully crafted animations
  • Pigeon Robert
data.about_the_game:
D̶a̶n̶d̶e̶l̶i̶o̶n̶ ̶i̶s̶ ̶a̶ ̶p̶s̶y̶c̶h̶o̶l̶o̶g̶i̶c̶a̶l̶ ̶h̶o̶r̶r̶o̶r̶ ̶a̶d̶v̶e̶n̶t̶u̶r̶e̶ ̶g̶a̶m̶e̶.̶ ̶E̶x̶p̶l̶o̶r̶e̶ ̶a̶ ̶c̶u̶t̶e̶ ̶t̶o̶w̶n̶ ̶f̶u̶l̶l̶ ̶o̶f̶ ̶c̶h̶a̶r̶a̶c̶t̶e̶r̶s̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶m̶e̶e̶t̶,̶ ̶t̶e̶a̶m̶ ̶u̶p̶ ̶w̶i̶t̶h̶ ̶f̶r̶i̶e̶n̶d̶s̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶w̶i̶n̶ ̶a̶n̶ ̶u̶p̶c̶o̶m̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶p̶l̶a̶n̶t̶ ̶e̶x̶h̶i̶b̶i̶t̶i̶o̶n̶.̶ ̶A̶n̶d̶.̶.̶.̶ ̶d̶o̶n̶'̶t̶ ̶b̶e̶ ̶a̶f̶r̶a̶i̶d̶,̶ ̶m̶e̶e̶t̶ ̶i̶t̶ ̶e̶v̶e̶n̶ ̶i̶f̶ ̶y̶o̶u̶ ̶a̶r̶e̶ ̶n̶o̶t̶ ̶r̶e̶a̶d̶y̶

S̶o̶m̶e̶t̶h̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶i̶s̶ ̶t̶r̶y̶i̶n̶g̶ ̶t̶o̶ ̶g̶e̶t̶ ̶o̶u̶t̶,̶ ̶i̶t̶'̶s̶ ̶n̶e̶v̶e̶r̶ ̶b̶e̶e̶n̶ ̶c̶l̶o̶s̶e̶r̶

Hey, can you please add me to your demo? I know that I will appear later in the game but
I want to be there, because who knows for how long you will be developing that shit!

Don't even try to refuse

Sincerly,
Vermin

Features


  • Solve puzzles by combining items and share them with others in exchange for precious plant seeds
  • Experiment with plant seeds, prepare for a plant exhibition
  • At least 1 unreasonably thicc pigeon
  • Soulful, character-rich story
  • Original art and soundtrack, carefully crafted animations
  • Pigeon Robert
data.short_description: Dandelion is a psychological horror adventure game focused on exploration. Navigate through a cute town, get to know others, even if the world you live in doesn't make sense

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 10
  • Processor: Core i3-7 Series
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card that can make music look like a cool 3d for no reason
  • Additional Notes: Its 2d, so you can run it on toaster, likely

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.15 Catalina +
  • Processor: Processor that can process 25 pigeons per second (Core i3-7 Series)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card that will make you feel like you're back in good old 90s even though you were born in 00s
